channel.title: Dashboard - Performance Areas on PRU Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Dashboard - Performance Areas on PRU Portal

item.title: Capacity
item.description: Period Area Update rate Last update Source(s) Data Jan 2018 EUROCONTROL area Monthly 18-May-2018 NM, PRU Please note that software release 20.0 of the Network Manager on 04 April 2016 introduced a change to improve the accuracy of the ATFM delay calculation for operational purposes. For more information on the change in methodology click here. Changes due to the Post Operations Performance Adjustment Process are not considered on this page.

item.title: Cost Efficiency
item.description: The new ACE interactive online dashboard enables interested stakeholders to access the latest available ACE data and analysis. Using the interactive functionalities of the dashboard, stakeholders can design and customise specific analyses and presentations covering the 2002-2015 period.

item.title: Environment
item.description: Horizontal En-route Flight Efficiency (HFE) Period Area Update rate Last update Source(s) Methodology Data Jan-Apr 2018 EUROCONTROL area Monthly 18-May-2018 NM, PRU Evolution over time (EUROCONTROL level) Results by entity (Jan-Apr 2018) // load the visualisation API google.load('visualization', '1', { packages: ['corechart', 'controls'] });

item.title: Safety
